    • Method Detail

      • addRoute

        public void addRoute(Route route)
        Adds a new Route object to the list of routes the program has available.
        Parameters:
        route - The Route object to be added to the program.

      • removeRoute

        public boolean removeRoute(Route route)
        Removes a Route object from the list of routes the program has available.
        Parameters:
        route - The Route object to be remove from the program.
        Returns:
        True if the Route existed in the program and was removed, False otherwise.

      • getRoutes

        public java.util.List<Route> getRoutes()
        Get a list of the routes in the program.
        Returns:
        The list of Route objects stored by the RouteManager.

      • saveRoutes

        public boolean saveRoutes(java.io.File file)
        Save the routes to the file specified.
        Parameters:
        file - The file that the routes should be saved to.
        Returns:
        True if the save operation succeeded, false otherwise.

      • loadRoutes

        public boolean loadRoutes(java.io.File file)
        Load the routes from the file specified.
        Parameters:
        file - The file that the routes should be loaded from.
        Returns:
        True if the load operation succeeded, false otherwise.

      • loadDefaultRoutes

        public void loadDefaultRoutes()
        This method is run on construction and will check if the default routes file exists and if not it will load the default data and save that data into the default file. If it does exist it will simply load the file.
